description: This table tracks the patient-reported extent to which the patient understood the educational material in question.

columns.name: EDUCATION_RECORD_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the education record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: USER_STATUS_KEY
columns.description: Caret-delimited list of title/topic/point whose user-entered status was updated.

columns.name: USER_STATUS_DAT_KEY
columns.description: Caret-delimited contact date (DAT) key related to the title/topic/point whose user-entered status was updated (item 96011)

columns.name: USER_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status entered by the patient or patient representative relating to their viewing of this patient education. If not set, the education is assumed to be unread.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unread


Read


I understand


Hidden


I have questions

columns.name: USER_ENTER_AT_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the status was specified by the patient or patient representative relating to their viewing of this patient education.

columns.name: STATUS_WEB_USER_ID
columns.description: This item holds the ID of the MyChart user who updated the status of this education
